availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Fulton Haynes (Marion, Kentucky, county attorney.)

body.p: Marion, Kentucky, county attorney. Livingston County, Kentucky native. Son of Robert Henry Haynes and Pemicia Fulton Haynes. Married to Anna Chastain in Crittenden County, Kentucky on February 16, 1854. Father of Harry A. Haynes, Samuel Chastain Haynes, Robert Fulton Haynes, and Mary Haynes. School teacher in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1850. Attorney in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1860. County attorney in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, District 2, p. 259A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, Marion (West Half), p. 407
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, Marion (West Half), p. 34A
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, p. 184
Find A Grave, "Robert Fulton Haynes, Sr. (1829--1896)," Memorial #66642256, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66642256 (accessed April 19, 2019).
